item.name: Queries

request.description: Returns latest entry of specified station
Returns the entry containing the most extreme temperature value (low: true for negative extreme)
Returns entries within a given timespan for a certain station
Returns the number of recorded entries based on given variables
Returns total number of registered stations

item.description: Collection of queries for wetter.vorchdorf.media's GraphQL API

item.name: Mutations

request.description: Creates a new temperature entry for the given station
